attributes.action: remove the link between the value of a property and the amount of council tax to be charged.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is PEOPLE not HOUSES who use the services supposed to be paid for by council tax.  It is immoral that a house containing (in the case of certain nationalities practices while working here) up to 30 individuals pays the same as a house where only one person lives.  Council tax should be charged on the basis of people in residence, not the (inflated) value of property.
